title: Afghan reporter makes heartfelt plea during exchange with NATO chief: 'Please don't recognize the Taliban'
content:
1. Afghan reporter makes heartfelt plea during exchange with NATO chief: 'Please don't recognize the Taliban'  The Washington Post
  2. White House admits 'fair amount' of US equipment in Afghanistan in Taliban hands  Fox News
  3. Intelligence Warned of Afghanistan Military Collapse, Despite Biden’s Assurances  The New York Times
  4. As Taliban retakes Afghanistan, Kabul-Saigon photo comparisons spotlight missed lessons  NBC News
  5. Afghanistan's fall to the Taliban just made terrorism a real threat, again  MSNBC
